Class PropertyConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.islandora.alpaca.support.config.PropertyConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    @PropertySource(value="file:${alpaca.home:alpaca-home-directory}/config/alpaca.properties",ignoreResourceNotFound=true) @PropertySource(value="file:${alpaca.config}",ignoreResourceNotFound=true)
public abstract class PropertyConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class of common properties

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxRedeliveries

        public int getMaxRedeliveries()
        Returns:
        the error.maxRedeliveries amount.

      • addJmsOptions

        public static java.lang.String addJmsOptions​(java.lang.String queueString,
                                             int concurrentConsumers,
                                             int maxConcurrentConsumers,
                                             boolean asyncConsumers)
        Utility function to append various JMS options like concurrentConsumer variables.
        Parameters:
        queueString - The original topic/queue string
        concurrentConsumers - The number of concurrent consumers. -1 means no setting.
        maxConcurrentConsumers - The max number of concurrent consumers. -1 means no setting.
        asyncConsumers - Indicate if the queue should be processed strictly queue-wise (false; more for dealing with overhead?); otherwise, allow multiple items to be processed at the same time.
        Returns:
        The modified topic/queue string.

      • addHttpOptions

        public java.lang.String addHttpOptions​(java.lang.String httpEndpoint,
                                       boolean forceAmpersand)
        Utility to add common endpoint options to HTTP endpoints.
        Parameters:
        httpEndpoint - The http endpoint string.
        forceAmpersand - If you want to use this function with a dynamic endpoint, this is whether to force an ampersand to start.
        Returns:
        The modified http endpoint string.

      • addHttpOptions

        public java.lang.String addHttpOptions​(java.lang.String httpEndpoint)
        Assumes not to forceAmpersand
        Parameters:
        httpEndpoint - The http endpoint string.
        Returns:
        The modified http endpoint string.
